main.name: Zeyu Liu
main.description: My desire to continuously learn will always be my greatest strength. Currently looking for a full-stack role.
main.bio: Hi! I am a full stack web developer with a background in finance and e-commerce. I started off my career as a Trade Controll Analyst for CIBC, and completed the CFA exam. Along the way, I established my own company: Ikigai & Soul, that is where I discovered my passion for technology and programming. As the founder of a mid-sized e-commerce company, I am passionate about creating seamless user interfaces that can generate maximum results. That passion along with my 3 years of experience in the financial industry, has given me the skills to bridge the gap between business and technology.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
